data_descriptor.name: day_light_duration
data_descriptor.description: Day light duration (sunset-sunrise time) in hours.

data_descriptor.name: max_temp
data_descriptor.description: Max predicted temperature of the day.

data_descriptor.name: min_temp
data_descriptor.description: Min predicted temperature of the day.

data_descriptor.name: humidity
data_descriptor.description: Percentage of humidity. Min is 0 and max is 100.

data_descriptor.name: clouds
data_descriptor.description: Percentage of clouds. Min is 0 and max is 100.

data_descriptor.name: other
data_descriptor.description: Summary of the weather in text.

algorithm.description: This stream provides various weather statistics of a participant's location.
